mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Logs (code, createDT, log1, log2) VALUES('rareAvatarSearch', NOW(), #{jobId}, #{categoryCode})
INSERT INTO Logs (code, createDT, log1, log2) VALUES('showRoomAvatarSearch', NOW(), #{jobId}, #{showroom})
